title: BONUS Ep. #1 | Staying Positive with Eric Nam
description:
Here’s a bonus episode to keep you occupied during these scary times. It’s hard to listen to the news nowadays but let’s reflect on the positive things from this global change. What have you been able to accomplish now that you have this time for yourself? Wishing you all safety and good health!
Make sure to subscribe to @daebakshow (IT’S FREE) and leave a comment, rating and/or review on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, Soundcloud, and YouTube.
Episodes are presented by @thedivestudios
Connect with us on all social media platforms @daebakshow and at http://www.divestudios.io/daebakshow !
SUPPORT & JOIN DIVE Studios' Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/divestudios
#EricNam #에릭남 #DaebakShow #DIVEStudios
